title: New: Heir Fuller – Escape
body:
Clocking in at well over eight minutes, _Escape_ may well be one of the most ambitious debut tracks of the year.

Hailing from Australia, Brisbane to be precise, **Heir Fuller** adds his name to a rapidly growing list of exciting young artists hailing from that part of the world. A simple piano riff and choir-esque harmonies open the _Escape_, a track that’s six minutes of subtle yearning, characterised by the strained vocals and ethereal atmosphere, before exploding into life, practically collapsing in on itself under the seas of shoegaze inspired guitars. Illuminating the inner turmoil experienced during the breaking down of a relationship, _Escape_ is stunning and devastating in equal parts. Check it out below.
